column4: hey guys, i was wondering if you might be able to help me with a xbmc-live question, it's based on ubuntu
although now when it boots it drops to console
i boot off the usb stick, works grea
however, i installed it, ran apt-get update/upgrade and installed nvidia drivers, now xbmc only starts when i type startx
now it just has a black screen or console
except for the fact that xbmc won't start on boot
but it works when i login and type start x
is it possible that the x server that gets started on boot is different than the one that starts when i type startx
